title: [RunInAsyncMainLoop] problem with exchange commands
body:
Happens when auto opening web interface when starting the bot

when using real trader

2019-03-18 22:50:14,829 ERROR    run_coroutine_in_asyncio_loop <coroutine object TradesManager.get_profitability at 0x7faa30127248> coroutine coroutine too long, cancelling the task.
 2019-03-18 22:50:14,830 ERROR    flask.app            Exception on /dashboard/profitability [GET]
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "site-packages/flask/app.py", line 2292, in wsgi_app
